radiographic_examinations.findings: Clear incompletely visualized lungs; concerning focal hepatic lesion; slight attenuation of the liver parenchyma compatible with fatty infiltration; normal pancreas; small hiatal hernia; scattered colonic diverticulosis; prominent uniform wall thickening, hyperemia, and prominent surrounding fat stranding with adjacent pockets of local free air in region of diverticuli in the sigmoid colon compatible with acute complicated sigmoid diverticulitis with microperforation; free fluid in the pelvis.
